name: Fantasy Worldcraft (FPS RPG)
description:
From the creators of Puzzle Survivor comes their latest global app.

No name, food, water or supplies. Where are you? Lake to the South, structures to the East. It doesn't matter now. YOU NEED TO SURVIVE. Set in a Fantasy and living world, your goal is simple: Save humanity. Find water and food while fending off the habitants of the world. Solve puzzles for rewards and progression. Can you unlock the secrets of Fantasy Worldcraft?


FEATURES

● Open World Environment - allowing you to explore grasslands, lakes, snowy peaks & more
● Complex puzzles - mazes, lava pits are just some of those you will encounter
● Enemies around every corner!
● Weapon crafting - where finding the right materials is key to fending off enemies
● Survival aspects - requiring careful resource management
● Hidden items - finding them can mean the difference between life & death
● Eye-catching graphics - transport you to another world
● Intuitive navigation system - provide full 360-degree movement & viewing
● In game signposts - will help you out… but not too much
● Rideable creatures - littered throughout the worlds

REVIEWS

5/5
"Visual beautiful! Loving the game so far. Makes my long commutes more bearable! Love the graphics of the game and can’t wait to see where the game ends up!"

5/5
“Very good, can’t wait for future updates”

5/5
“Brilliant! Compelling, intriguing and fun. I love it!”

INSTRUCTIONS

1. Use the onscreen joysticks to look & move around the 3D world
2. Collect resources to stay alive, collect materials to craft weapons & defend yourself against the numerous enemies
3. Solve the puzzles to find all your treasure to save the World


HINTS N TIPS

● If your food or water drops too low you will start losing health
● If you need some resources you have already gathered, you can always wait for it to re-spawn
● More features regularly released. Let us know what you would like to see!
